header.title: Jo Swinson brutally confronted on ITV leader debate snub - 'It's not sexism, it's realism'
header.subtitle: LIBERAL DEMOCRAT leader Jo Swinson was brutally savaged by a Channel 4 news presenter who questioned her “sexism” claims as the Remain MP hasn’t been invited to a live TV debate.
header.postText: Ms Swinson believes the live TV debate is an “establishment stitch-up” made by Prime Minister Boris Johnson and Labour leader Jeremy Corbyn. Channel 4 News presenter Cathy Newman said it “would take a miracle” for the Remain MP to walk into Downing Street on December 12. She said: “ You’ve said this is sexist. Isn’t it the reality that it’s not sexism, it’s realism that the two main credible candidates for Prime Minister are the ones who should get the scrutiny in a head-to-head debate?”', 'Speaking to Channel 4 News, Ms Swinson said: “I’m a candidate to be Prime Minister of this country.”', 'Ms Newman interjected: “You’re a candidate but you’re not going to get there, are you?”', 'Ms Swinson continued: “That’s not up to you or to any other journalist, that’s up to the voters or this country.', '“We’re in a very volatile time in politics and I just say to political journalists, are there any predictions in the past few years that have been spectacularly wrong?', '“Many people didn’t think Jeremy Corbyn would become leader of the Labour Party or that Donald Trump would become president.', '“Back in the 2015 election we saw the SNP go from 6 to 56 MPs in Scotland.', '“So we’ve not been a stranger to political surprises.”', 'Ms Newman added: “The polling average, Conservatives 37 percent, Labour 27 percent, Liberal Democrats 17.', '“Put that together with the electoral system, it would take a miracle to put you into No10.”', 'Ms Swinson responded: “It’s absolutely possible. If you look at those polling averages they are actually very similar to where we were polling in the 2010 election.', '“Yet in 2010 we had leadership debates that were three-way debates, Gordon Brown, David Cameron and Nick Clegg - three men.', '“When it comes to a similar polling situation, Boris Johnson and Jeremy Corbyn, I’m excluded.”', 'Her comments come as ITV has planned to host a live TV debate between Mr Johnson and Mr Corbyn in the run-up to the election.', 'Ms Swinson labelled the move “sexist” and is considering legal action against the broadcaster.', 'Sky News have proposed plans to hold a debate between all three leaders.', 'Ms Swinson has already agreed and called out the others on Twitter.
header.socioLingVar: Gender - General,Nationality - European or anti-Europeans,Age - Over 65s

commentThread.commentText: The first commandment in the feminist for dummys handbook reads keep shouting sexism until you get what you want
Full of her own importance she has limited ability.
The woman is a megalomaniac, a condition which should have prevented her becoming an MP. Was she thoroughly vetted?
Lib dims think they can cancel brexit and 17.4 million voters will call it a day so WRONG what planet is she from hoping the snp take her seat.
Realism is not a word that is recognised within the vocabulary of the Unliberal Undemocrats.
If this non entity is on a TV leaders' debate why can't we have the leader of the party that scored highest in the most recent nationwide election- not just a poll?

If we ever discussed and voted on issues that come under the heading of "Realism" - we would have a changed country. Alas, some subjects are taboo so we can't discuss these issues for fear of offending.
Wonder she didn't stamp her foot or throw herself on the floor

Personally I cannot stand this woman, she has all the finesse of a fishwife and why should we have another shrieking Scot down here in our Parliament when they have their own which she could share with the little Cranky.
To think that an old ewe gave up its teeth for Swinson - those gnashers have all the signs of grass and fodder damage
I    I   I  ME   ME   ME  OH YES I COULD BECOME THE PM.   SILLY WOMAN
She really is the very definition of "deluded" and "patronising"!!!!!
She can't  quite get her head around the fact that she is unimportant in the great scheme of things.

How can anyone - male/female, rich/poor, young/old, BREXITeer/Remainer, whatever - STAND this patronising, delusional woman? She is completely, head over heels in love with HERSELF and the money the EU pays her husband, of course!
Her mate LaLa was on Sky this morning had to switch her off.

According to her logic because shes running to be pm????she ought be there,so by the same logic every party leader ought be there SNP, Brexit, greens etc,if it's good enough for her it's good enough everyone

Another useless Libdumb leader who will fade into obscurity only to be replaced with something similar. The sexist card, feminist card or any other card she wants to play will not make the Libdumbs lead this country. I really can 't wait for one of them to knock on my door lol

I don’t like Jo Swinson or her political views but she is 100% right on this, TBP should also be in this debate so why is it only the Tories and Labour that are having a debate, that does not make sense, all parties should be included in debates.
Swinson is what we Scots call a chancer.
Being bunged £3mn by the EU to wage war against the UK, is a stitch up of the victims of this crimewave.
